<a id="class_GLTFTexture"></a>

# GLTFTexture

**Inherits:** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

GLTFTexture represents a texture in a glTF file.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Runtime file loading and saving](../tutorials/io/runtime_file_loading_and_saving.md)

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="class_GLTFTexture_property_sampler"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](class_int.md) **sampler** = `-1` [ðŸ”—](#class_GLTFTexture_property_sampler)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_sampler**\ (\ value\: [int](class_int.md)\ )
- [int](class_int.md) **get_sampler**\ (\ )

ID of the texture sampler to use when sampling the image. If -1, then the default texture sampler is used (linear filtering, and repeat wrapping in both axes).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_GLTFTexture_property_src_image"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](class_int.md) **src_image** = `-1` [ðŸ”—](#class_GLTFTexture_property_src_image)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_src_image**\ (\ value\: [int](class_int.md)\ )
- [int](class_int.md) **get_src_image**\ (\ )

The index of the image associated with this texture, see [GLTFState.get_images()](class_gltfstate.md#class_GLTFState_method_get_images). If -1, then this texture does not have an image assigned.
